rule.description: Yandex: MBD.mongodb new hosts has been added to a cluster by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb shard has been added to a cluster by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb backup has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb new cluster has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb new database has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb user has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb clusters has been deleted by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb hosts has been deleted from a cluster by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb shard has been deleted from a cluster by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb database has been deleted from a cluster by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb database user has been deleted by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb sharding has been enabled for a cluster by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb privileges to a database user has been assigned by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb cluster has been moved by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb new cluster from a backup has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb a database user's privileges has been revoked by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb cluster has been started by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb cluster has been stopped by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb cluster has been updated by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.mongodb database user has been updated by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
